channel.title: Adding ::Suggestion
channel.description: I Wanna Add A ::Suggestion Because Atm Im Running My Beta. And Id Like Some Feed Back From The Players. So If Someone Has It Or Has The Link To A Tut. I Searched But Didnt Find Anything.

item.title: Adding ::Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“nicola, post:4, topic:268453”][code]

if(command.startsWith(“suggest”)) {
sendMessage(“Sending…”);
sendMessage(“Suggestion succesfully sent.”);
BufferedWriter bw = null;
String suggestion = command.substring(8);
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“suggestions.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+": "+suggestion);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error Suggesting”);
}
}
}

[/code]

Straight from richscape v2 source so cred to rich` not me! just posting as it may help…also you might need to change it a bit to work with the source you using.[/quote]
Yes, keep re-creating a new instance of the BufferWriter class each time the command is called.

Read full topic

if(command.startsWith(“suggest”)) {

BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“suggestions.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+": "+suggestion);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error Suggesting”);
}
}
}

[/code]

Straight from richscape v2 source so cred to rich` not me! just posting as it may help…also you might need to change it a bit to work with the source you using.[/quote]

For that you will need to have a text file called ‘suggestions’

item.title: Adding ::Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:


if(command.startsWith("suggest"))  {
      sendMessage("Sending...");
	sendMessage("Suggestion succesfully sent.");
	BufferedWriter bw = null;
String suggestion = command.substring(8);
try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("suggestions.txt", true));
	bw.write(playerName+": "+suggestion);
	bw.newLine();
	bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	if (bw != null) try {
     bw.close();
	} catch (IOException ioe2) {
     sendMessage("Error Suggesting");
	}
      }
}

Straight from richscape v2 source so cred to rich` not me! just posting as it may help…also you might need to change it a bit to work with the source you using.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding ::Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

You can use a substring after the command as the suggestion and log it to a file with the writeLog method.
